name: Chicky Catchers
description:
Chrome/Firefox users: Please use the threaded version instead to avoid issues with audio stuttering and latency.
Chrome/Firefox is recommended for this game due to performance reasons.

Chicky Catchers v1.03
by DDRKirby(ISQ) and Kat Jia
Released under the Cocoa Moss label

Please be patient as the game loads! You may have to click to give it focus.

This is the unthreaded version of Chicky Catchers, since itch.io does not yet support SharedArrayBuffer usage.

Chicky Catchers is our entry for round 49 of Ludum Dare. The theme was "Unstable".

Ludum Dare submission page

Changelog >>

v1.03 (Jam) - Fix lower scores overwriting higher scores - Replicate 2p sliding effect in single-player mode - "Balance" fix level 2 v1.02 - Fix bugged high score displays after menu transitions v1.01 - Fix only level 1 being accessible - Fix high scores being offset by one level - Fix offset collected chicky sprites - Attempt to fix bug where game wouldn't end - Fix left side world edge being visible - Physics and "balancing" fixes/tweaks v1.00 - First release!
